///////////Java Basic Program//////////

package demo1;

public class HelloWorld {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int a =10;
		
		int b =30;
		
		int c =a+b;
		
		System.out.println("Hello World : Today is Monday");
		System.out.println("Addition value : " +c);
	}

}


---------

output:
Hello World : Today is Monday
Addition value : 40
